original_text: just as Sodom and Gomorrah and the surrounding cities, which likewise indulged in sexual immorality and pursued unnatural desire, serve as an example by undergoing a punishment of eternal fire.
korean_text: 소돔과 고모라와 그 이웃 도시들도 그들과 같은 행동으로 음란하며 다른 육체를 따라 가다가 영원한 불의 형벌을 받음으로 거울이 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: just as Sodom and Gomorrah and the surrounding cities
which likewise indulged in sexual immorality
by undergoing a punishment of eternal fire
